fields.name: GroupByAlertDetails
fields.description: A list of alert details to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected)

fields.name: GroupByCustomDetails
fields.description: A list of custom details keys to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected). Only keys defined in the current alert rule may be used.

fields.name: GroupByEntities
fields.description: A list of entity types to group by (when matchingMethod is Selected). Only entities defined in the current alert rule may be used.

fields.name: LookbackDuration
fields.description: Limit the group to alerts created within the lookback duration (in ISO 8601 duration format)

fields.name: MatchingMethod
fields.description: Grouping matching method. When method is Selected at least one of groupByEntities, groupByAlertDetails, groupByCustomDetails must be provided and not empty.
